item.title: physics769
item.description: Lattice QCD (T) - physics769 Course Lattice QCD (T) Course No. physics769 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 3+2 7 ST/WT Requirements: Preparation: Quantum Mechanics 1+2, Quantum Field Theory 1 Form of Testing and Examination: Written / oral examination Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: To give an introduction to the quantum field theory on the lattice Contents of the Course: Introduction: Quantum mechanics on the lattice
